task.summary: Documentation revision and optimization. Readonly properties ready.
Validation of the data type of the mklObj object properties. Readonly properties redefined. Documentation revision and optimization.
There were tested different width ranges. At least for images in digit recognition task.

Random grid in linear way is working. Possible we can use Bash code for parallelizing, instead of Python multiprocessing.

Local parallelization reached.
